item.title: In the past 24 hours, there has been a total of $806 million in liquidations across the network, with the majority coming from long positions.
item.description: On August 25th, based on the data from Coinglass, the total value that was liquidated across the entire network within the past 24 hours amounted to $806 million USD. Among them, there were $643 million USD in long liquidations and $163 million USD in short liquidations.

item.title: As Bitcoin Continues to Decline, U.S. Stock Cryptocurrency Concept Stocks Weaken Pre-market
item.description: On August 25th, based on market data, Bitcoin has been in a three-day consecutive decline, with pre-market weakness in U.S. stock cryptocurrency concept stocks. The ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF decreased by 4.3%, Riot Platforms (RIOT.O) dropped by 3.6%, and Marathon Digital (MARA.O) fell by 3.7%.

item.title: A Certain Bitcoin Ancient Whale Liquidated ETH Long Position to Take Profit, Making a $39.36 Million Profit in 3 Days
item.description: On August 25th, as per on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "BTC Ancient Whale Who Slept for Seven Years and Took a High-Profile Leverage on ETH" has closed two ETH long positions for profit-taking, realizing a profit of $39.36 million within three days.

item.title: Bitcoin Briefly Drops Below $111,000
item.description: On August 25th, based on HTX market data, Bitcoin briefly fell below $111,000 and is now trading at $111,605, with a 24-hour decrease of 2.86%.

item.title: FTX/Alameda Collateral Address and FTX Liquidator Address currently hold a total of $10.03 billion USD SOL
item.description: Update, August 25th: Based on on-chain data, the staking address of FTX/Alameda currently holds 4,737,092 staked SOL. At the current SOL price, this is worth approximately $952 million. FTX/Alameda withdraws SOL around the 10th of each month.Furthermore, according to Arkham data, the liquidator address of FTX currently holds 255,076 SOL, which is approximately $51.27 million.Previously reported, Galaxy, Jump, and Multicoin are aiming to raise $1 billion to purchase SOL.

item.title: Base Layer Sports Prediction App Football.Fun Surpasses $1.5 Million in Revenue
item.description: On August 25th, based on Dune data, the Football.Fun, a sports prediction app based on the Base chain with a reward mechanism, has currently accumulated 10,738 active user wallet addresses. The total value locked (TVL) on the platform is 10.79 million US dollars, and the total revenue is 1.54 million US dollars.According to the official website data, the total market value of Football.Fun's player token is currently reported to be 93.19 million US dollars, with a 24-hour price change of +12.9%.

item.title: A Certain Whale Buys $10 Million Worth of ETH Again After 10 Days
item.description: On August 25th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), a certain swing whale spent 10 days purchasing 10 million USDT worth of 2123.14 ETH with an average on-chain price of $4710. Subsequently, it placed a limit sell order at $4800.

item.title: ChainOpera Ranks Top on the BSC Chain AI Project List, Driving the Development of the "Collaborative Intelligence" Ecosystem, with AI Users Surpassing 3 Million
item.description: On August 25th, ChainOpera AI achieved the top position on the daily list within the AI category of DApp Bay on the BNB Smart Chain (BSC), emerging as the AI DApp with the highest on-chain transaction volume.The official announcement on X conveyed that ChainOpera has ascended to "the first among AI projects and the second in the overall ranking" on the BNB Smart Chain and expressed gratitude to the community, users, and developers.Since proposing the concept of "Collaborative Intelligence," ChainOpera has constructed a full-stack collaborative AI ecosystem, encompassing Agent social networks, the Intelligent Agent Marketplace, and decentralized AI infrastructure (models, computing power, data), attracting more than 3 million users and 100,000 developers. Super AI applications based on the Agent social network continuously release strong community vitality and user stickiness.This ranking at the top of DApp Bay indicates that ChainOpera has further consolidated its leading position i

item.title: 「$125,000 Long ETH Liquidation」 Whale Long Position Partially Liquidated, Unrealized Gain Drops to $1.13 Million
item.description: August 25th. According to ChainInfo, the long position of the "Long ETH with $125k Leveraged Position" whale in ETH was partially liquidated once more. The open long position profit has decreased from $5.5 million to $1.13 million.After the liquidation and reduction, the whale still maintains 14.6k ETH long positions, which are worth $67.7 million.

item.title: Binance Alpha will launch MTP, and the airdrop claiming threshold is set at 200 points.
item.description: On August 25th, as per official channels, Binance Alpha is set to launch Multiple Network (MTP), and Alpha trading will commence on August 25, 2025, at 22:00 (UTC+8).After the trading initiates, users possessing at least 200 Binance Alpha Points can obtain 750 MTP tokens through a first-served basis airdrop. In case the reward pool is not entirely distributed, the points threshold will automatically reduce by 15 points every hour.Claiming the airdrop will require 15 Binance Alpha Points. Users must complete the confirmation on the Alpha Events page within 24 hours; otherwise, it will be regarded as a waiver of the claim.
